text: NGRTD (also known as Négritude) is the fourth studio album by French rapper Youssoupha, which was released on May 18, 2015 by Bomayé Music. ==Track list== #"Où est l'amour ?" (3:11) #"Salaam" (4:37) #"Points communs" (feat. Alonzo, Disiz, Lino, Médine or Sam's) (4:39) #"Maman m'a dit" (3:38) #"Memento" (feat. Les Casseurs Flowters) (3:38) #"Love Musik" (feat. Ayọ) (3:23) #"À cause de moi " (feat. Humphrey) (3:19) #"Chanson française" (3:00) #"Entourage" (5:00) #"Le score" (feat. Nemir) (3:41) #"Niquer ma vie" (4:29) #"Mannschaft" (4:53) #"Black Out" (3:39) #"Smile" (feat. Madame Monsieur) (3:41) #"Négritude" (4:27) #"Mourir mille fois" (5:01) #"Public Enemy" (3:57) ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Charts (2015) ! title: NGRTD
